Python Shapeways Documentation¶

Contents:

  • shapeways.client

Installing¶

pip install shapeways

Documentation¶

Documentation can be found at ReadTheDocs.

Building Documentation¶

Once built the docs can be accessed from /docs/_build/html/index.html

git clone git://github.com/Shapeways/python-shapeways.git
cd python-shapeways
make docs

Versions before 1.0.0¶

The original client was written and maintained by @pauldw for information about versions earlier than v1.0.0 please visit https://github.com/pauldw/shapeways-python
